p: Activated AlloStim ® express high density CD40L and type 1 cytokines, including IFN-ϒ, TNF-α and GM-CSF. AlloStim ® has been shown to modulate the immune systems of heavily pre-treated metastatic cancer patients (which resemble the senescent immune systems of the elderly) and has been used in protocols which were designed to elicit the same anti-tumor mechanism of allogeneic stem cell transplant procedures (graft vs tumor or “GVT”) without the need for a matched donor, chemotherapy conditioning or risk of GVHD [ 30, 31, 34– 38].
